translated: The Birth Story of the Elder Saraṇagamani
A battle was fought🔽between the two kings of the gods.
Padumuttara, the knower of the world,
the Teacher, standing in the sky,
having laid aside their armor and weapons;
having paid homage to the Buddha,
they became one-pointed for a while.
A person with a corrupted mind,
is reborn in a lower realm.
On the battlefield, like an elephant,
so that you are not killed again and again.
The army of the two kings of the yakkhas🔽was amazed;
